about_the_game: This time saver pack gives you access to all 6 bonus songs: "Boss" by Chris Lee, "Space Ostrich" by Disonaur, "Jules" by Seth Chapla, "Ricochet" by Brian Adam McCune, "Six AM Salvation" by VsThem, and "The Star Spangled Banner" by Seth Chapla.
detailed_description: This time saver pack gives you access to all 6 bonus songs: "Boss" by Chris Lee, "Space Ostrich" by Disonaur, "Jules" by Seth Chapla, "Ricochet" by Brian Adam McCune, "Six AM Salvation" by VsThem, and "The Star Spangled Banner" by Seth Chapla.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor:2.0 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo E4400 or 2.0 GHz AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 3800+
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:256 MB DirectX 9 / NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 2600 XT
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:12 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c-compliant
